[00:00.00]Solo Dolo, Pt. III (Explicit) - Kid Cudi
[00:02.48]Lyrics by：Scott Mescudi/Oladipo Omishore/Patrick Reynolds/Nicholas Britell/Rafeal Brown
[00:04.97]Composed by：Scott Mescudi/Oladipo Omishore/Patrick Reynolds/Nicholas Britell/Rafeal Brown
[00:07.46]Oh oh oh oh
[00:15.52]Yeah yeah every bottle
[00:20.18]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[00:28.14]Woah woah ah
[00:33.82]Hmm hmm hmm hmm
[00:41.23]Ah ah ooh yeah yeah
[00:51.31]Yeah I take it they don't know 'bout it
[00:54.04]Yeah I take it I don't need nobody
[00:57.60]Deep in the hell and dark corners
[01:00.67]Deep in my dreams proceed now
[01:03.90]Yeah I take it they don't know 'bout it
[01:06.76]Yeah I take it I don't need nobody
[01:10.62]Can't hear me scream
[01:13.97]Somethin' twistin' me
[01:16.30]Say "I'm waitin' to die" I cry
[01:19.25]Many nights I spent gettin' f**ked up livin' the life
[01:22.01]We get up and spread up this tequila in me
[01:25.06]Don't tell me to be cool this is how cool I can be woah
[01:29.17]You could try readin' my mind
[01:31.27]Been posted up for days I'm on the miss and decline woah
[01:35.84]Losin' reality been sayin' I'm fine try my hardest to sleep
[01:42.27]Too many issues brother say I work through it all
[01:45.64]Think they knowin' what the problems are
[01:48.12]Had me goin' crazed through the city while I burn it down
[01:51.41]This is just my way keep on prayin' for me
[01:54.65]Lonely in my ride as I fly I'm just open wide
[01:58.12]Don't wanna leave without sayin' "Bye"
[02:00.82]Had a rough night didn't sleep soon
[02:03.57]Don't even worry 'bout it wait until the Devil comes
[02:07.28]Yeah I take it they don't know 'bout it
[02:09.84]Yeah I take it I don't need nobody
[02:13.37]Deep in the hell and dark corners
[02:16.43]Deep in my dreams proceed now
[02:19.64]Yeah I take it they don't know 'bout it
[02:22.45]Yeah I take it I don't need nobody
[02:26.59]Can't hear me scream
[02:29.35]Aaahhhh
[02:31.68]He's callin' me so much go on while I blow off steam
[02:39.25]And it's just the same oh look at that only you to blame
[02:44.59]Ah it's like I'm swimmin' towards another bona fide life
[02:48.66]Just like the fairy tale one more
[02:51.36]But inside begs just a question why
[02:54.24]Nobody show me that I'm tested and I'm gonna fly
[02:57.32]I ain't sleepin' no that's not for me
[03:00.04]Be who you are don't be nothin' less please
[03:03.86]Hear me Lord don't ever leave see
[03:06.81]I'm a man in the night in these dark streets
[03:10.15]Somethin' else how it felt
[03:12.66]Take a drink I live in excess nothin' left
[03:15.82]Every minute slippin' away this is hell
[03:18.56]They were warning him prayin' he becomes a fool
[03:35.48]Yeah I take it they don't know 'bout it
[03:38.07]Yeah yeah
[03:38.42]Yeah I take it I don't need nobody
[03:40.81]Yeah yeah
[03:41.82]Deep in the hell and dark corners
[03:44.28]Yeah
[03:44.74]Deep in my dreams proceed now
[03:47.43]Yeah
[03:48.11]Yeah I take it they don't know 'bout it
[03:50.72]Yeah
[03:51.07]Yeah I take it I don't need nobody
[03:53.81]Yeah
[03:54.91]Can't hear me scream
[03:56.82]Scream
[03:58.01]Somethin' twistin' me
data.trans:
[ti:Solo Dolo, Pt. III (Explicit)]
[ar:Kid Cudi]
[al:Man On The Moon III: The Chosen (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.48]//
[00:04.97]//
[00:07.46]//
[00:15.52]每一瓶酒
[00:20.18]//
[00:28.14]//
[00:33.82]//
[00:41.23]//
[00:51.31]我承受的痛苦 他们不了解
[00:54.04]我默默承受 我不需要别人
[00:57.60]在黑暗的角落 深陷炼狱中
[01:00.67]在我的梦境深处不断前行
[01:03.90]我承受的痛苦 他们不了解
[01:06.76]我默默承受 我不需要别人
[01:10.62]听不到我的呐喊
[01:13.97]有什么在折磨着我
[01:16.30]我等待着死亡 我放声痛哭
[01:19.25]很多个夜晚 我都过得痛苦不堪 这可悲的生活
[01:22.01]我们起床之后 就开始买醉
[01:25.06]不要叫我冷静 我只能做到这种程度
[01:29.17]你可以试试读我的心
[01:31.27]已经这样好几天了 我总是找不到归属感
[01:35.84]脱离现实 我一直说我很好 却总是睡不好
[01:42.27]太多问题 兄弟说我会熬过去的
[01:45.64]可能他们知道问题在哪里
[01:48.12]疯狂的我在城市里穿行 到处搞得乱七八糟
[01:51.41]这就是我的态度 继续为我祷告吧
[01:54.65]独自开着车飞驰 我张开怀抱
[01:58.12]不想不辞而别
[02:00.82]这一夜很难熬 没有睡好觉
[02:03.57]别担心 等恶魔降临就好了
[02:07.28]我承受的痛苦 他们不了解
[02:09.84]我默默承受 我不需要别人
[02:13.37]在黑暗的角落 深陷炼狱中
[02:16.43]在我的梦境深处不断前行
[02:19.64]我承受的痛苦 他们不了解
[02:22.45]我默默承受 我不需要别人
[02:26.59]听不到我的呐喊
[02:29.35]//
[02:31.68]他在呼唤我 在我释放压力时 发生了好多事
[02:39.25]没有什么变化 看看这一切 责任都在你
[02:44.59]就好像我正游向另一种美好的人生
[02:48.66]就像童话故事一样
[02:51.36]但我心中还是充满了疑问
[02:54.24]没人告诉我说经历了考验就能高飞
[02:57.32]我不睡觉 睡觉这种事不适合我
[03:00.04]做你自己 千万不要降低标准
[03:03.86]听我说 上帝 不要离开我
[03:06.81]我是在夜里游走街头的人
[03:10.15]那种感觉有点不寻常
[03:12.66]喝一杯酒 我活得太放纵 已经一无所有
[03:15.82]时间一分一秒地过去 这简直就是炼狱
[03:18.56]他们警告他 祈祷着他变成傻瓜
[03:35.48]我承受的痛苦 他们不了解
[03:38.07]//
[03:38.42]我默默承受 我不需要别人
[03:40.81]//
[03:41.82]在黑暗的角落 深陷炼狱中
[03:44.28]//
[03:44.74]在我的梦境深处不断前行
[03:47.43]//
[03:48.11]我承受的痛苦 他们不了解
[03:50.72]//
[03:51.07]我默默承受 我不需要别人
[03:53.81]//
[03:54.91]听不到我的呐喊
[03:56.82]呐喊
[03:58.01]有什么在折磨着我
